H0.text: what type of currency do they use in thailand. Vietnamese Dong

H1.text: what type of currency do they use in thailand. Malaysian Ringgit

H3.text: what type of currency do they use in thailand. Thai baht

A4.text: The baht (; Thai: บาท, pronounced [bàːt]; sign: ฿; code: THB) is the official currency of Thailand.

A5.text: SWIFT ranked the Thai baht as the 10th-most-frequently used world payment currency as of December 2023.
